name: Jsadakhata
body:
### Welcome to JSadaKhata
JSadakhata is a Javascript+HTML implemention of SADAKHATA. You just need to Download->unzip->Open sadakhata.html. It'll automatically opened with your default browser. Then write :)


## For Developer
**_YOU MUST ADD THE COPY OF "Copyright && License" IN YOUR PAGE'S HEADER..._**

If you are a _Developer_(\#respect) you can use sadakhata tool easily!!! In your HTML page, add these lines in \<head\>\</head\>

```
<link rel="stylesheet" href="CSS/jquery-ui.css" />
<script type="text/javascript" src="JS/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="JS/jquery-ui.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="JS/sk.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="JS/jsDB.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="JS/myDB.txt"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="JS/avro.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="JS/jquery.caret.1.02.js"></script>
```
**Note: Keep the files in perfect directory.**

now Let You have a textarea/input field with id="inp". Then to Active sadakhata to this field add these lines in \<head\>\</head\>
```
<script type="text/javascript">
$(function() {
	sadakhata($("#inp"));
});
</script>
```

## Want to Contribute???
There is a file myDB.txt in JS folder. If you want to make your own database just add a line like:
```
a("ENGLISH_WORD", "COMMA_SEPARATED_BANGLA_WORDS");
```
example:
```
a("mohit", "মোহিত,মুহিত,মহিত");
```

If you added a lot of word(near about 200-300) and think that these word may be missed by us, you can send the file to us!!!

### Support or Contact
